summary: Completed comprehensive testing of NEWMECLASS website focusing on mobile responsiveness, duplicate sections check, and admin dashboard functionality. All requirements from the review request have been successfully verified.
passed_tests: Homepage has no duplicate sections - all 8 sections appear exactly once
Hero Carousel fully responsive on mobile (390x844) with working navigation
Product Slider responsive on mobile - shows 1 item per view as expected
Testimonial Slider responsive on mobile with working navigation
About Section responsive on mobile with proper layout
Services Section responsive on mobile (B2B/B2C columns)
Activities Section responsive on mobile - shows 2 columns (4 cards total)
Benefits Section responsive on mobile with all 5 benefits
Visi Misi Section responsive on mobile with contact info
Admin login successful with credentials: admin@newmeclass.com / admin123
Admin dashboard loads correctly with all menu items visible

All 14 admin menu items found and displayed: Dashboard, Users, Payments, Products, Questions, Certificates, Banners, Referrals, Articles, Team & Mitra, Running Info, Analytics, Settings, Manajemen Admin
Admin menu navigation working - tested Users, Products, Settings pages
Desktop responsiveness confirmed - all sliders and sections work properly
Activities section shows 4 columns on desktop as expected
All CTA buttons visible and functional
